MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the ML12 postcode area of Biggar is still ongoing. This is due to additional repairs required and we now expect power to be back on by 5.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.03pm on 17th December 2020.
